body:
Fixes #3861 

This PR is a continuation of #2083. See https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/3861#issuecomment-295343581 for an explanation of the deficiencies in the way we did things in #2083.

This PR contains 2 major changes:

- [x] Don't add any system paths to `PATH`
- [x] Add Spack compiler wrappers to the beginning of the `PATH`, before dependencies
title: Don't add system paths to PATH
